mdException.name: net.geoprism.data.etl.UnknownLocationException
mdException.label: Unknown Location Exception
mdException.message: The location [{locationLabel}] could not be found in the system. You can resolve this by creating a synonym, a new GeoEntity, ignoring the data, or modifying the error spreadsheet and reimporting.

mdException.name: net.geoprism.data.etl.UnknownClassifierException
mdException.label: Unknown Category Exception
mdException.message: The category [{classifierLabel}] could not be found in the system. You can resolve this by creating a synonym, a new Category, ignoring the data, or modifying the error spreadsheet and reimporting.
